prompt: Dame una imitacion perfecta de la imagen

structured_prompt.short_description: A split portrait featuring two distinct anime-style characters. The left side depicts a character with light blue hair and a calm, slightly melancholic expression, rendered in cool blue and white tones. The right side shows a character with spiky red hair and an intense, fierce expression, depicted in stark red, black, and white. A sharp vertical line divides the two faces, emphasizing their contrasting appearances and moods.

objects.description: The left half of an anime-style character's face, featuring light blue, wavy hair with subtle white highlights, a large eye with a light blue iris and a small white starburst detail, and a small nose piercing. The skin is pale white with blue undertones. The character's expression is serene and slightly sad.
objects.location: left half of the frame, center
objects.relationship: Part of a split portrait, contrasting with the right character.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular shapes, predominantly light blue, white, and dark blue.
objects.appearance_details: Stylized anime features, including large eye and delicate facial structure. Small white dots and lines suggest light or sparkle on the hair and face.
objects.expression: Calm, slightly melancholic, with a hint of sadness in the eye.
objects.clothing: Dark, indistinct clothing visible at the bottom left.
objects.skin_tone_and_texture: Pale white with blue undertones, smooth.

objects.description: The right half of an anime-style character's face, characterized by spiky, dark red hair, a sharp, intense eye with a black iris, and prominent black markings resembling stitches or scars on the cheek and below the eye. A small drop of red liquid (blood) is visible near the mouth area. The skin is pale white.
objects.location: right half of the frame, center
objects.relationship: Part of a split portrait, contrasting with the left character.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular shapes, predominantly red, black, and white.
objects.texture: Stylized, sharp hair and smooth skin.
objects.appearance_details: Aggressive anime features, including sharp eye and prominent facial markings. Red lines and patterns are visible within the red hair.
objects.clothing: Indistinct, dark clothing visible at the bottom right.

lighting.direction: Evenly lit from the front, emphasizing the flat, graphic style.
lighting.shadows: Minimal, stylized shadows used for depth and definition rather than realistic light fall-off.

aesthetics.composition: Symmetrical split composition, with each character occupying exactly half of the frame. Close-up portrait composition.

structured_prompt.context: This is a concept for a character design illustration, possibly for a video game, anime series, or graphic novel, showcasing two contrasting personalities or aspects of a single character.
